tasks.label: Upload main.py
tasks.command: python -m mpremote connect COM10 cp ./main.py :/main.py; python -m mpremote reset

tasks.label: Upload RokVehicle files
tasks.command: python -m mpremote connect COM17 cp -r ../RokCommon :/; python -m mpremote connect COM17 cp -r . :/; python -m mpremote reset

tasks.label: Upload FPV files
tasks.command: python -m mpremote connect COM19 cp -r ../RokCommon :/; python -m mpremote connect COM19 cp -r . :/; python -m mpremote connect COM19 reset

tasks.label: Erase Flash and reflash RokVehicle firmware
tasks.command: python -m esptool --port COM16 erase_flash; sleep 10; python -m esptool --chip esp32s3 --port COM16 write_flash -z 0x0 'c:\Users\Tim Ehrlich\Downloads\ESP32_GENERIC_S3-SPIRAM_OCT-20251209-v1.27.0.bin'

tasks.label: Erase Flash and reflash FPV firmware
tasks.command: python -m esptool --port COM18 erase_flash; sleep 10; python -m esptool --chip esp32s3 --port COM18 write_flash -z 0x0 'c:\Users\Tim Ehrlich\Downloads\FPVfirmware.bin'

tasks.label: Show all files
tasks.command: python -m mpremote connect COM19 fs tree
